data.text: @ritviccc @MitheleshKoul एक आम इंसान अखिलेश सरकार की गुंडा गर्दी 5 साल में भी भूला नही है ,पर ये समझने के लिए तुमको अपनी बुद्धि को और विकसित करना पड़ेगा https://t.co/FxwlS55bF6
@ritviccc @alon_31 Hahah. Yaha ande de raha fir. Pad le jake. Good night and all the best 😃

@MitheleshKoul @alon_31 M+y mixture hai, pure poles ni, electoral benefits k liye hai, yeh talwarein leke ek dusre ko maarne ni daudenge. H-M polarisation kal ko drop of needle mein ek dusre ko maarne daudenge. Ab last baari good night😭😭😭😭. Kal baat krte hain, paper hai subah mera😭😭😭

@MitheleshKoul @alon_31 but agar aap mereko ghar baithe opinion banane pe aisa bologe toh yeh fir gaslighting ho gayi. Anyways jaane do🥱🥱
Good night🥱🥱

@MitheleshKoul @alon_31 Sir random interaction hai apki, sahi galat ho skti hai, aapne konsi proper sampling ki hai, ya hum konsa Telangana ya TN pe opinion bnane se phle logon se baat cheet krte hain comprehensively. Subjective cheez hai. Ps :- I am not saying that ur interactions arent valid. They r

@ritviccc @alon_31 Agar purani sarkar ki schemes ka benefit larger section of society ko mila hota to fir baat hi kya tgi dost. Khair jaane do. Aur rahi baat polarisation ki to mjjhe hasi aa rahi teri baat pe. M+Y har ralky cheekh cheekh ke bolna polarisation nai hota kya 😭😭

@MitheleshKoul @alon_31 haarni he ni chahiye thi, jeetna incumbent gormint ne he tha iss baar yeh toh sure tha he, mere liye SP BSP are lesser evils, for doing lesser polarisation, baaki toh chalo Chlta rehta. Waise bhi politics mein unbiased koi ni hota yeh jaante ho aap bhi, objectivity is a myth here

@MitheleshKoul @alon_31 Sir unbiased kon rakhta hai, fake encounters, polarisation, are no hidden things
Baaki schemes ka kya hai, Agra Lucknow expressway jiska maanaiya dwara naam badla gya, Lucknow metro, kisan insurance, lohia awas yojna, laptops, scooties yeh sab bhi thi, iss logic se toh SP 2017 m
@alon_31 @ritviccc SP ke raaj me sirf positive chize dekhne wale ko obviously is govt me sab negative hi dikhega 😃
